about_the_game:
This is an in-game item for Tales of Graces f Remastered that increases the level of all party members by +5.

*Maximum level 200 cannot be exceeded.

content_descriptors.notes: Player Characters use swords, staffs, and magic attacks to defeat human enemies and creatures (e.g., wolves, bears, plant monsters). Battles are accompanied by slashing sounds and colorful light effects; damage is indicated by depleting health meters and a loss of hit points. Cutscenes depict more intense acts of violence: characters getting impaled, thrown against walls, or stabbed. A character throws herself towards an enemy and explodes, seemingly committing suicide.

detailed_description:
This is an in-game item for Tales of Graces f Remastered that increases the level of all party members by +5.

*Maximum level 200 cannot be exceeded.
